resources.string: Blood pressure is a measurement used in medicine. In the body, the arteries carry blood away from the heart. As blood travels through the arteries, it presses against the walls of the arteries. Blood pressure measures how hard the blood is pushing against the walls of the arteries. ... The first is the systolic pressure.

Stress is the body reaction to any change that requires an adjustment or response. The body reacts to these changes with physical, mental, and emotional responses. Stress is a normal part of life. ... Even positive life changes such as a promotion, a mortgage, or the birth of a child produce stress.
